64346.<voice 00130_00064346><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00130_00064346><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Ho ho <pc>! You came. I was
looking for you because I have a favor
to ask you.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64347.<voice 00170_00064347><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00170_00064347><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>I've found out how to get back to my
original form!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64348.<voice 00210_00064348><start_lip_sync m1:
According to the ancient texts of our country, there is a sacred fountain in a place called Jyra Jungle that can
break the curse of the powerful Edge.

64349.<voice 00240_00064349><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00240_00064349><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>The name is Kudus Spring. It is said
that if you dwell there, the curse
will be lifted in an instant.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64350.<voice 00280_00064350><start_lip_sync m1:
If we remain in this state, we will not be able to conduct the affairs of the country. We must regain our human
form as soon as possible.

64351.<voice 00310_00064351><start_lip_sync m1:
Normally, I would have gone with the soldiers of the castle to Jyra Jungle to look for Kudus Spring, but only a
few people know of my appearance.

64352.<voice 00350_00064352><start_lip_sync m1:
So, knowing what was going on and knowing your skills, I thought it would be a good idea to have you as my
escort, and Minister Kabusu agreed to do it.

64353.<voice 00380_00064353><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00380_00064353><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>What do you think? Can you escort me
to Kudus Spring in the Jyra Jungle
northwest of the Defel Desert?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64355.<voice 00510_00064355><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00510_00064355><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>That's why I'm going to follow you,
quietly and quietly. Then, let's get
going!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64356.<voice 00705_00064356><start_lip_sync m1:

64357.<voice 00735_00064357><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00735_00064357><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Clean them up quickly and hurry back.
I'll be waiting for you here.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66966.<voice 00930_00066966><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00930_00066966><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>What? I had no idea that my benefactor
was such a heartless man.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

66967.<voice 00960_00066967><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00960_00066967><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>But I'll wait here, believing that

64358.<voice 00130_00064358><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00130_00064358><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>! I knew you would
come again, since you have such a

64359.<voice 00170_00064359><start_lip_sync m1:
According to ancient texts, there is a sacred fountain in a place called Jyra Jungle, northwest of Defel Desert,
that can break the curse of the powerful Edge.

64360.<voice 00200_00064360><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00200_00064360><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>The name is Kudus Spring. I want you
to take me to that fountain.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64361.<voice 00240_00064361><start_lip_sync m1:
I believe that if I surrender myself to Kudus Spring, I can lift the curse of the moustache and return to my
human form. Will you do it?

64362.<voice 00130_00064362><start_lip_sync m1: <voice 00130_00064362><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Nuh? What's up <pc>.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64363.<voice 00170_00064363><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00170_00064363><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>I need you to take me to Kudus Spring,

64364.<voice 00202_00064364><start_lip_sync m1:

64365.<voice 00252_00064365><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00252_00064365><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Well <pc>. Let's go! Don't

64366.<voice 00250_00064366><start_lip_sync m1:

64367.<voice 00465_00064367><start_lip_sync m1:

64368.<voice 00635_00064368><start_lip_sync m1:

64371.<voice 01225_00064371><start_lip_sync m1: <voice 01225_00064371><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Hmmm! What is this?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64373.<voice 01625_00064373><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01625_00064373><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Wow! What's this?<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64374.<voice 01900_00064374><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01900_00064374><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>We did it! I'm back to my old self!<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64375.<voice 01950_00064375><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01950_00064375><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>What do you think? <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000091.<voice 01951_29000091><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01951_29000091><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Wow, it really was a person.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64380.<voice 02320_00064380><start_lip_sync n0:
